topics.body:
Someone should make a Thomas the Tank Engine game on the unity engine that is true to the old kids show.

You're given instructions on which way to go, and if you fuck it up, you crash, or something like that. Totally would play that.
topics.author: 5307a92d6368722c6c0d0100

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554eff8e63687279c75a0d00#post_554eff8e63687279c75a0d00
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]Mad Max is in the same world as Fallout and Book of Eli. Fallout just happens later. But Metro 2020 takes place a but after Mad Max.[/bq]
Did you know that Book of Eli was supposed to be the Fallout movie that everyone was speculating for years? But due some legal reasons, everything was changed.

"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554fa252636872451dea0c00#post_554fa252636872451dea0c00
The more i think about the better it sounds.

Sadly, all existing Thomas games are made for very young children, and are basically garbâge.
